Asli Dukan (amụrụ n'afọ 1973) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta mgbasa ozi onwe ya, ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí na onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke bi na Philadelphia na-arụ ọrụ na isiokwu nke akụkọ ifo na Afrofuturism.
Asli Dukan na Newark, New Jersey ma too na Harlem, New York. Dukan na-eto ezinụlọ ya na nwatakịrị màkà imetụta ya na uche ndị isi ojii na akụkọ sayensị.
Asli Dukan nwere MFA nke Media and Communication Arts site na Mahadum City nke New York (CUNY) nyèrè na 1999 na mmepụta ihe nkiri BA site na Machị New Jersey City na 1997
Ónyé na-eme  nkírí Ayoka Chenzira bụ otu n'ime ndị prọfesọ ya.
Dukan bụ ónyé nkụzi na Mahadum Pennsylvania Ọ kụzikwaara na Mahadum nke Arts na City College nke New York.
Dukan na-ekwu na ọ "na-anabata ọdịnihu, ihe ịtụnanya na ụdị echiche efu nke akụkọ ifo (SF) dị ka ụzọ isi nyochaa ohere nke mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọha mmadụ

" O dere, mepụta ma duzie ọtụtụ obéré ihe nkírí SF nke gosipụtara na mmemme ihe nkiri gafee mba ahụ, Newark International Film Festival, ImageNation Film and Music Festival, Langston Hughes Film Festival na Blackstar Film Festival. O nyela aka na mpịakọta ndị ọkà mmụta banyéré Afrofuturism na ihe ndị na-eme na ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi.  O guzobere Mizan Media Productions, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke na-elekwasị anya na akụkọ ifo Afro-diasporic na akụkọ ndị na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, n'afọ 2000. Site na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya, ọ duziri ma mepụta ihe nkiri akụkọ ifo dị mkpirikpi, yana vidiyo maka ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri.
